arStrings.szText: When {c_important}Rabies{/c} infects an enemy, reduce its Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds. This Cooldown reduction is tripled when infecting Elite enemies.
Infecting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of {c_important}Rabies{/c} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds.
